name: Virus L
description:
Virus L is a thrilling shooter done in a sandbox style! Undertake missions in this fully voiced action adventure, and turn the tide of the undead back.
Find the source of Virus L. Enemies become progressively harder. Earn points to unlock new weapons, Melee combat and Duel wielding.
Rain down fury on hundreds of undead and showing them no mercy as you and your companions work to save what's left of humanity.
